DOC.brief_summary: The aim study provide confirmatory evidence clinical benefit LPLD patient treat alipogene tiparvovec assess `` clinical response '' ( defined range parameter ) , `` metabolic response '' ( postprandial CM metabolism ) LPLD patient without immunosuppressant regimen .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , interventional , randomised , open-label , parallel group study evaluate clinical response well dynamic postprandial chylomicron metabolism patient treat alipogene tiparvovec without immunosuppressant . The study conduct 12 LPLD patient randomise Immuno+ ( cyclosporin mycophenolate mofetil ) Immuno- group .
DOC.criteria: Main inclusion criterion : Patients history severe multiple pancreatitis attack despite dietary fat restriction . Genetically confirm diagnosis LPLD Postheparin plasma LPL protein mass > 5 % normal LPL activity â‰¤20 % normal ( post heparin plasma ) Fasting plasma TG concentration > 10 mmol/L . Main exclusion criterion : Females positive pregnancy test breastfeeding , contraceptive use . Patients positive HIV , Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C positive tuberculosis . Patients treatment antiplatelet anticoagulant . Patient allergic condition prohibits use immunosuppressant .
